parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant

parameters.description: Avi Tenant Header UUID
parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant-UUID

parameters.description: The caller is required to set Avi Version Header to the expected version of configuration. The response from the controller will provide and accept data according to the specified version. The controller will reject POST and PUT requests where the data is not compatible with the specified version.
parameters.name: X-Avi-Version

parameters.description: Avi Controller may send back CSRF token in the response cookies. The caller should update the request headers with this token else controller will reject requests.
parameters.name: X-CSRFToken

parameters.description: SSOPolicy object creation
parameters.name: body

parameters.description: object name
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that refers to another Avi resource. Its syntax is refers_to=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all virtual services referring to pool p1 will be refers_to=pool:pool_p1_uuid
parameters.name: refers_to

parameters.description: Filter to request all objects that are referred by another Avi resource. Its syntax is referred_by=<obj_type>:<obj_uuid>. Eg. get all pools referred_by virtual service vs1 - referred_by=virtualservice:vs_vs1_uuid
parameters.name: referred_by

parameters.description: List of fields to be returned for the resource. Some fields like name, URL, uuid etc. are always returned.
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description: All the Avi REST reference URIs have a name suffix as URI#name. It is useful to get the referenced resource name without performing get on that object.
parameters.name: include_name

parameters.description: Default values are not set.
parameters.name: skip_default

parameters.description: It automatically returns additional dependent resources like runtime. Eg. join_subresources=runtime.
parameters.name: join_subresources

parameters.name: X-Avi-Tenant

begin.description: Starting IP address of the range.

end.description: Ending IP address of the range.

host_hdr.description: Host header value to be matched. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

attr_matches.description: Attributes whose values need to be matched . Field introduced in 18.2.5.

method.description: HTTP methods to be matched. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

path.description: Paths/URLs to be matched. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

methods.description: Configure HTTP method(s). Enum options - HTTP_METHOD_GET, HTTP_METHOD_HEAD, HTTP_METHOD_PUT, HTTP_METHOD_DELETE, HTTP_METHOD_POST, HTTP_METHOD_OPTIONS, HTTP_METHOD_TRACE, HTTP_METHOD_CONNECT, HTTP_METHOD_PATCH, HTTP_METHOD_PROPFIND, HTTP_METHOD_PROPPATCH, HTTP_METHOD_MKCOL, HTTP_METHOD_COPY, HTTP_METHOD_MOVE, HTTP_METHOD_LOCK, HTTP_METHOD_UNLOCK.

match_criteria.description: Criterion to use for HTTP method matching the method in the HTTP request. Enum options - IS_IN, IS_NOT_IN.

group_refs.description: UUID of IP address group(s). It is a reference to an object of type IpAddrGroup.

match_criteria.description: Criterion to use for IP address matching the HTTP request. Enum options - IS_IN, IS_NOT_IN.

ip_addr.description: Placeholder for description of property ip_addr of obj type IpAddrPrefix field type str  type object

attribute_value_list.description: Attribute Values used to determine access when authentication applies. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

attribute_name.description: Attribute name whose values will be looked up in the access lists. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

host_hdr.description: Configure the host header. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

client_ip.description: Configure client ip addresses. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

path.description: Configure request paths. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

authz_rules.description: Authorization Policy Rules. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

match_case.description: Case sensitivity to use for the matching. Enum options - SENSITIVE, INSENSITIVE.

string_group_refs.description: UUID of the string group(s). It is a reference to an object of type StringGroup.

match_criteria.description: Criterion to use for matching the path in the HTTP request URI. Enum options - BEGINS_WITH, DOES_NOT_BEGIN_WITH, CONTAINS, DOES_NOT_CONTAIN, ENDS_WITH, DOES_NOT_END_WITH, EQUALS, DOES_NOT_EQUAL, REGEX_MATCH, REGEX_DOES_NOT_MATCH.

_last_modified.description: UNIX time since epoch in microseconds. Units(MICROSECONDS).

tenant_ref.description: UUID of the Tenant. It is a reference to an object of type Tenant. Field introduced in 18.2.3.

authentication_policy.description: Authentication Policy Settings. Field introduced in 18.2.1.

name.description: Name of the SSO Policy. Field introduced in 18.2.3.

authorization_policy.description: Authorization Policy Settings. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

type.description: SSO Policy Type. Enum options - SSO_TYPE_SAML, SSO_TYPE_PINGACCESS. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

uuid.description: UUID of the SSO Policy. Field introduced in 18.2.3.

action.description: Authorization action when rule is matched. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

index.description: Index of the Authorization Policy rule. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

enable.description: Enable or disable the rule. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

name.description: Name of the rule. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

match.description: Authorization match criteria for the rule. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

type.description: Authentication Action to be taken for a matched Rule. Enum options - SKIP_AUTHENTICATION, USE_DEFAULT_AUTHENTICATION. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

action.description: Enable or disable authentication for matched targets. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

index.description: Index of the rule. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

enable.description: Enable or disable the rule. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

name.description: Name of the rule. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

match.description: Add match criteria to the rule. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

string_group_refs.description: UUID of the string group(s). It is a reference to an object of type StringGroup.

match_criteria.description: Criterion to use for string matching the HTTP request. Enum options - BEGINS_WITH, DOES_NOT_BEGIN_WITH, CONTAINS, DOES_NOT_CONTAIN, ENDS_WITH, DOES_NOT_END_WITH, EQUALS, DOES_NOT_EQUAL, REGEX_MATCH, REGEX_DOES_NOT_MATCH.

match_case.description: Case sensitivity to use for the match. Enum options - SENSITIVE, INSENSITIVE.

value.description: String value(s) in the host header.

match_criteria.description: Criterion to use for the host header value match. Enum options - HDR_EXISTS, HDR_DOES_NOT_EXIST, HDR_BEGINS_WITH, HDR_DOES_NOT_BEGIN_WITH, HDR_CONTAINS, HDR_DOES_NOT_CONTAIN, HDR_ENDS_WITH, HDR_DOES_NOT_END_WITH, HDR_EQUALS, HDR_DOES_NOT_EQUAL.

entity_id.description: Globally unique entityID for this node. Entity ID on the IDP should match this. Field deprecated in 18.2.3. Field introduced in 18.2.1.

sp_metadata.description: SAML SP metadata. Field deprecated in 18.2.3. Field introduced in 18.2.1.

cookie_name.description: HTTP cookie name for authenticated session. Field deprecated in 18.2.3. Field introduced in 18.2.1.

single_signon_url.description: Single Signon URL to be programmed on the IDP. Field deprecated in 18.2.3. Field introduced in 18.2.1.

authn_rules.description: Add rules to apply auth profile to specific targets. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

key.description: Key to generate the cookie. Field deprecated in 18.2.3. Field introduced in 18.2.1.

default_auth_profile_ref.description: Auth Profile to use for validating users. It is a reference to an object of type AuthProfile. Field introduced in 18.2.3.

auth_profile_ref.description: Auth Profile to use for validating users. It is a reference to an object of type AuthProfile. Field deprecated in 18.2.3. Field introduced in 18.2.1.

cookie_timeout.description: Cookie timeout in minutes. Allowed values are 1-1440. Field deprecated in 18.2.3. Field introduced in 18.2.1.

status_code.description: HTTP status code to use for local response when an policy rule is matched. Enum options - HTTP_RESPONSE_STATUS_CODE_403. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

type.description: Defines the action taken when an authorization policy rule is matched.By default, access is allowed to the requested resource. Enum options - ALLOW_ACCESS, CLOSE_CONNECTION, HTTP_LOCAL_RESPONSE. Field introduced in 18.2.5.

name.description: name to use for cookie encryption.
